To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Kicking _kicking;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_kicking = Kicking(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_kicking.IsReady)
{
    var period = _kicking.Period.Value;
    var current = _kicking.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.kicking = self.Kicking(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.kicking.IsReady:
    period = self.kicking.Period.Value
    current = self.kicking.Current.Value
